message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $20,000. It's a fantastic deal!
Alice, $20,000 is way too high for me. I'm only interested if you come down closer to my budget. How about $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a steal for this product. I can come down to $17,000, but that's my bottom line.
Alice, while I appreciate you coming down, $17,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to go with John's offer.
